title: Serene Ooty Hill Station Escape With Daily Breakfast & Daily Lunch or Dinner
description:
Set amid the sky-high mountain peaks of Ooty, Fortune Resort Sullivan Court, Ooty is a paradise beckoning you for a tranquil escape. Step back in time at this beautiful hotel, named after John Sullivan, the founder of Ooty. Just 1km from the charming hill town's centre, and an 8.5-hour drive from Bengaluru, Fortune Resort Sullivan Court, Ooty is your personal paradise in the hills.

Retrace the footsteps of John Sullivan, gaze upon stunning views of the Nilgiris and simply relax in complete comfort at this tranquil hotel. Perfect for a weekend escape with your friends and family, this hilltop retreat puts you in close proximity to everything the 'Queen of Hill Stations' has to offer: from Ooty's colonial-era buildings to lush gardens, age-old churches and alluring hills.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin every morning with breakfast at Pavilion
- Enjoy a daily choice of buffet lunch or dinner for two at Pavilion
- Make the most of your stay with a 25% discount on soft drinks, dining and spa
- Relax with an hour of steam or sauna for two, once per stay, at the Health Club
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Two children (five years and under) stay free on existing bedding with breakfast only.

**Suite Upgrade**: Perfect for families, the sprawling Suite features a separate living room and bedroom, dressing room and dining table.
offer_address: 123, Selbourne Road, near Govt Rose Garden, Ooty, Tamil Nadu 643001
